full_summary:
-----------------------------

**Title:** ETS Static Display Analyzer
------------------------

### Tender Reference Number

*   Tender Reference Number: cb-981-49307900
*   Amendment Number: 2
*   Solicitation Number: W8486-238883/B

### Details

*   Publication Date: March 12, 2024
*   Tender Closing Date: April 22, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
*   Expected Contract Start Date: April 1, 2024
*   Expected Contract End Date: July 31, 2024

### Procurement Details

*   **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** Worldwide
*   **Delivery Regions:** National Capital Region (NCR)

### Item Description

The Department of National Defence invites bids for the purchase of two Electronic and Communication Measuring and Testing Instruments, ETS Static Display Analyzer, NSN: 6625 01-7074872. Deliveries are requested at Quality Engineering Test Establishment, 45 Sacre-Coeur Blvd, Gatineau, QC, J8X 1C6 by July 31, 2024.

**Item Details:**

*   NSN: 6625 01-7074872
*   Part No.: 4406
*   NSCM/MFG: 56541
*   Quantity: 2
*   Unit of Issue: EA

### Inquiry and Submissions

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. Suppliers are required to submit their bid online through the Canadabuys platform.

For any inquiries, please contact:
Justin Laundrie
justin.laundrie@forces.gc.ca
(343) 571-8929
